about.title: Web developer specialized in service professionals
about.bio_1: Independent web developer based in France, I build professional showcase websites for freelancers and small firms who need a clean, fast and credible online presence.
about.bio_2: I chose to specialize in one precise sector: service professionals — lawyers, architects, consultants, therapists — for whom online image is a direct lever of trust and conversion.
about.bio_3: My approach: listen first, propose a tailored solution, deliver fast, and stay available long after launch.
